path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Amplify voting Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/Amplify voting Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/contracts

findings.title: Local Variable Shadowing
findings.description: The owner variable in function userOwnsTheLock shadows the owner variable in Ownable.sol, which may lead to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Required Zero-Trust Policy
findings.description: Delegators must follow a zero-trust policy and sign their message hashes by themselves to prevent attackers from convincing them to sign malformed messages through phishing or social engineering attacks.
